Parameters: AudioEffect: the effect on which the interface is registered.
onEnableStatusChange(android.media.audio.Description: Called on the listener to notify it that the effect engine has been enabled or disabled.
onEnableStatusChange(android.media.audio.FullName: public abstract void onEnableStatusChange (AudioEffect effect, boolean enabled)

ClassDesc: The OnEnableStatusChangeListener interface defines a method called by the AudioEffect when the enabled state of the effect engine was changed by the controlling application.
